A video work inspired by the "meaning, form and origin" of kanji, reinterpreted and archived using the technique of stop-motion animation. A project that began with the realization that it is the "likeness" drawn out by the imagination that is the essence of kanji.

(Source: TECARAT's Official Site)

title: Kankou Taisen Saitama: Sakuya no Tatakai
synopsis:
Saitama Prefecture released this promotional 4-episode ONA to highlight more than 50 tourist destinations.

(Source: AniDB)

title: Kanojo wa Utau, Dakara Boku wa.
title_english: She Sings, as If It were Destiny

title: Kanpai
synopsis:
Space-born Edward meets Sakura at a spaceship bar where she introduces him to her country's national drink: Japanese sake. She uses her expertise growing up at a sake brewery to educate Edward on how sake is made, the different types of sake, and sake drinking customs. Edward visits her family brewery and learns the sake brewing process firsthand and how important sake is to Japanese culture.

(Source: JapanSakeOfficial YouTube channel)

title: Karrimor Mountain Club
synopsis: A series of animated commercials produced by Karrimor Japan to promote their Mountain Club line of hiking rucksacks and explain their various features.

title: Karrimor Mountain Club 2
synopsis: The second season of animated commercials produced by Karrimor Japan to promote their Mountain Club line of hiking rucksacks and explain their various features. In this season, we follow Camilo's sister Caroline, as she ventures into the great outdoors with the help of Dr. Bird.

title: Kate Arrow x !EXC: Pony Tail
synopsis: A collaboration between Kate Arrow's Pony Tail and !EXC, a fashion building in Asahikawa.

title: Kehin Kazoku
title_english: The Story of a Common Family
synopsis:
Satoshi Totsugawa, a 39-year-old man working at a small advertising agency in the city, is proud, vain, and full of complexes. He laments his own situation, which is far below his wife's annual income, is manipulated by a poor junior at work, and cannot hide his infidelity from a fellow designer. He is a middle-aged man who is on the path to a life of complaints. But then Satoshi is appointed head of the apartment building association, and is manipulated by the eccentric residents! Set in the ultra-futuristic tower apartment building "Keihin Grand Solenase" that towers into the sky above Keihin, this is a realistic, yet comical and loving portrayal of modern people's communication patterns.

(Source: Wikipedia, translated)

title: Kenkou Takarabune Sukoyaka 7
synopsis:
The self-described "slightly surreal masterpiece anime" follows the "Sukoyaka 7," a group based on the Seven Lucky Gods of Japanese mythology. The anime explains issues related to Japan's health insurance system in a comedic way.

(Source: ANN)

title: Kensaku to Enjin no Atarashii Tomodachi: Query Toujou!
synopsis: Yahoo!'s Kensaku to Enjin franchise gained a new character: Query. She wants to be an idol, loves fashion, and gets quite the motor mouth when angry. This short 2D animation debuts her on stage.

title: Kensaku to Enjin no Christmas (2019)
synopsis:
In Kensaku's bedroom, where he sleeps peacefully, the shadow of Enjin stands suspiciously...
A heart-warming Christmas animation featuring Yahoo's official character "Enjin" and friends.

(Source: Kensaku to Enjin Official YouTube Channel, translated)

title: Kepu Zhongguo: Xiao Po Hai Jindu Xilie
Keshikko
synopsis: Keshikko is Kamio Japan's new character line. Based in a stationary world, these are animals that live in erasers (keshigomu).

title: Kicks And Punk
synopsis:
"Let's go. In search of treasure"
Nike, a punky outsider girl, runs through the city of the future! In a city where the transportation infrastructure has developed dramatically and walking is no longer necessary, Nike runs alone in her favorite sneakers. Her goal is to get sneakers from the legendary manufacturer "Dynameros", which can only be obtained on the black market. As Nike runs despite being chased by a horde of cyber police, a woman appears in front of her. That woman is none other than Sherry, the daughter of the president of "Fractal Walter", a major company that created the era. What kind of story will the encounter between these two opposing people produce?

(Source: Official site, translated)

title: Kimezou no Kimarimonku Ja Kimaranee.
synopsis: Follows the story a flamboyant Kimezou who works for a company that makes star shaped confections.

title: Kimezou no Kimarimonku Ja Kimaranee. Featuring Sabu-Otoko
synopsis:
Follows the story of young employee of a company that produces star-shaped confections. The unusual man views society cynically and does not fit typical Japanese competitive male stereotypes. 

He has to contend with a variety of coworkers including the flamboyant Kimezou, the company president, and the president's daughter.

(Source: ANN)

title: Kirin no Koushin
synopsis:
A short animation created by UrumaDelvi.

Four giraffes are marching to...

title: Kiss made, Ato 1-byou.
title_english: A Second Away From A Kiss
synopsis:
He said he'd stop one second before we kiss... So why are we really kissing right now!? My first kiss is on stage performing a play......! We've been friends since we were kids, and Izuru's always bossing me around. I have to write the script for our school festival play, which is a relief because at least I can steer clear of Izuru, who's playing the leading role of the prince...... But on performance day, the princess gets sick, and I have to take her place! I'm dreading the final kissing scene. We're just supposed to pretend, but now... our lips are... touching...! I know it's Izuru... but he looks like a handsome prince, and... he's actually kinda hot......

(Source: Ebook Renta)

title: Kkeutnal-ui Bam
synopsis: The magical story of five boys against an unknown power.

title: Kobara Support x Kamiusagi Rope
synopsis:
A collaboration between Taisho Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.'s  Kobara Support product and Kamiusagi Rope.

Kobara Support is a fruit flavored drink for those with an upset stomach, dieting, or ill. These people would have difficulty eating normal foods so when Kobara Support is drunk on an empty stomach (which is high in acid), a chemical reaction occurs where the stomach acid and the pectin fiber to become carbonated foam. This expands and doubles in volume while turning into jelly. For the drinker, their stomach becomes physically full thus shutting off the hunger receptors letting continue their day without stomach pains.

title: Kodomo datta Tsurai yo
synopsis:
Watabe and Nokishita are primary school students living in Japan in early 1990s. They like to play a popular RPG game or buy the popular chocolate snacks with stickers inside.

(Source: YouTube)

title: Koeda-chan Koushiki Anime
synopsis: A new Koeda-chan franchise web anime based on the Takara Tomy toy line. This particular series takes place solely in Koeda-chan's world.

title: Koeda-chan
synopsis: Animated Koeda-chan videos based on the Takara Tomy toy line.

title: Koeda-chan Ohanashi
synopsis: A stop-motion series of Koeda-chan. This unique short uses the actual Koeda-chan toys themselves to convey the story.

title: Kokoro no Tokyo Kakumei
synopsis:
A studio DLE collaboration with the Tokyo Metropolitan government, aims to improve Tokyoites' public manners and regard for others. 

Three total videos were made and released on the same day.

One video reminds viewers that the Olympics and Paralympics are coming to Tokyo in five years and exhorts them to make Japan "something they can be proud of." The campaign emphasizes that adults behave well, because they will set a good example for children, and "when children change, the future will change too." 

And another video introduces the series' main characters, Animal Hamaguchi (a former pro wrestler), and his daughter, Kyouko Hamaguchi (a current pro wrestler), who chide a woman for not returning children's greetings. 

(Source: ANN)

title: KoSys! Lite
synopsis: The series focuses on the staff of the Keihime Railway Company.

title: KoSys! Kochira Keihime Tetsudou: Kouhou System-ka
synopsis: Comedy anime about the staff of Keihime Railway Company.

title: Kubbe Kort Animasjon
synopsis: Johnsen Kubbe's picture book adaptation. Each story is split into two videos titled "prequel" and "sequel" for a total of 24 episodes.

title: Kubrick
synopsis: A series of geometric shorts by Mirai Mizue.

title: Kuiba Yao Xia Zhuan
synopsis: The backstories of the characters in the Kuiba movies.

title: Kung Fu Jiazu: Ben Ben Shu
Kuromi's Pretty Journey: Hacha Mecha! Multiverse Daidasshutsu!
synopsis: Kuromi's new journey into multiverse and met Niko.

title: Kusohamu-chan Happy Birthday!
synopsis: A special video to commemorate the 5th anniversary of Kusohamu-chan.

title: Kuwagata Tsumami
synopsis: Tsumami is the half-human, half stag beetle daughter of a female fashion model and a big male stag beetle. She has jaws on top of her head and loves to eat watermelons. She is a troublemaker, causing problems to other people!

title: Kuusou Suizokukan
synopsis: Kuusou Suizokukan features characters that are inspired by the sea creatures in a future aquarium like rabbit-penguins, parakeet-sea lions, and bear-jellyfish.

title: Kyoushi no K
synopsis: Mini anime for Touhai: Ura Rate Mahjong Touhai Roku.

title: Lalala Lala-chan
synopsis: Lala-chan is a slightly selfish squirrel girl. On her birthday the gifts given to her by her friends go awry. The group gets teleported into a new world (Earth) where they try to retrieve the elemental magic crystal balls that bring balance in their world.

title: Lalala Lala-chan Mini
synopsis: Lalala Lala-chan video letter style episodes. Characters break the 4th wall to talk to the viewer as if it was a reality show studio being filmed on camera. The episodes are meant to complement each episode of Lalala Lala-chan.

title: Larva Family
synopsis: After yellow and red is captured by Mauve that flies them inside the greenhouse of a new location (that is close to New York, and the island) they begin their adventures inside the greenhouse while raising a baby larva, Magenta. Their parenthood adventures begins now.

title: Larva Pendant
synopsis:
Bug friends Red and Yellow leave the island behind and go to the big city.

(Source: IMDb)

title: LayereD Stories Zero
synopsis:
In Shibuya, Tokyo in 2037, LayereD is a platform that uses mixed reality technology to create visualizations of the Internet in the real world. By using special devices, people can have various augmented-reality experiences. Users are able to bring things they imagine into the real world, allowing for a wide variety of self-expression. However, the system does not provide people the freedom it was supposed to, and people actually live in an oppressive society. In the Varna Counter system, harmful creations are eliminated in order to make LayereD "completely clean and healthy." Because users monitor each other to maintain regulations, society becomes rigid and constrained.

(Source: ANN)

title: Leonardo Hakase to Kirin-mura no Nakama-tachi
synopsis:
A collaboration between Japan Toys"R"Us and DLE. These episodes followed Dr. Leonardo from the Eagle Talon franchise; and two Giraffe brothers, relatives of the original Geoffrey the Giraffe.

The entry is the web-exclusive episodes of Leonardo Hakase to Kirin-mura no Nakama-tachi streamed on Toy"R"Us' official website.

title: Levain Cup x Kamiusagi Rope
synopsis: A collaboration between Kamiusagi Rope and J-League's Levain Cup soccer tournament.

title: LG gram 360 x Julia Ryu: Shimcheong Dive
title_english: LG gram 360 x Dive from Shimchoengjun
synopsis: A commercial for LG Electronics.

title: Liang Bu Yi 2nd Season Small Theater
title_english: No Doubt In Us 2nd Season Small Theater

title: Lian Ti Shi Wan Ceng: Wo Yang De Gou Dou Shi Dadi
synopsis:
Five thousand years ago, teenager who had countlessly longed for cultivation, but because of his special physique, was unable to break through the physical training period and enter the next realm of cultivation. He has been practicing from the ancient mythology era to modern day.

(Source: Manga Updates)

title: Liang Bu Yi 2nd Season Small Theater
title_english: No Doubt In Us 2nd Season Small Theater

title: Liang Bu Yi Small Theater
title_english: No Doubt In Us Small Theater

title: Liang Bu Yi Small Theater
title_english: No Doubt In Us Small Theater

title: Licca-chan to Mahou no Kuni
synopsis:
Takara Tomy's popular doll "Licca-chan" got it's own animation "Licca-chan and the Magical World" produced by DLE Inc.

This time the theme is a telephone, based on Licca-chan's (Rika-chan's) phone, and the story has elements that capture the girls' hearts such as Magic and Becoming a Princess.

As supporting characters there's the vivid colored "Bear", a humorous take on princess as "Ann Queen" (voiced by Asa Komuro) and other original characters, creating an original scenario.

(Source: DLE,  Inc.)

title: Life of the Dead Episode 7
synopsis: Studio Binzo's 7th episode in their Life of the Dead series. After facing issues with season 2's publication, season 3 was cancelled, and with it, episode 7 never got music, voice work, and SFX done and was abandoned. Six years later, Studio Binzo released it on their official Youtube channel so people could finally watch it.

title: Life of the Dead Season 2
synopsis: Episodes 5 and 6 of Life of the Dead.

title: Line Rangers
synopsis: Line Rangers follows the Line characters as super heroes who battle enemies. The various "story movies" of the web anime are meant to promote the Line Rangers RPG game app.

title: Line Rangers (2018)
synopsis:
While Line Friends enjoyed peaceful lives, Sally got kidnapped by alien troops! Her friends in Line Town transformed into Rangers and saved her. However, that was not end of it. The Rangers realized evil Paimon was behind the Alien troops with the aim to destroy the planet and conquer the universe. Will Line Rangers be able to defeat Paimon and save the universe?

(Source: Amazon Prime Video)

title: Ling Wu Dalu
synopsis:
Lingwu Continent is a world where spiritual power and martial spirit coexist. A spiritual cultivator can move mountains and rivers with a thought, and a martial artist can tear the world apart with bare hands. Chen Tian, ​​a former genius in Xingchen Town, lost his martial spirit and dried up his spiritual sea after he turned ten.

Since then, he has become a waste of his family and has been looked down upon by others. In a life-and-death struggle, Chen Tian fell off a cliff and mistakenly entered the formation arranged by the ancient sword emperor. Under the influence of the power of the heavenly book, he awakened his spiritual and martial dual cultivation physique. At the same time, he also obtained a strange memory and a mysterious storage ring. 

From then on, he rose from adversity, broke through the reincarnation of the Heavenly Dao Palm, and finally crossed the shackles of the emperor's calamity and aspired to become the champion of Lingwu Continent!

(Source: iQIYI)

title: Ling Yun Daima
synopsis:
In 2048, the Lingyun system, as the first case of "smart brain popularization application", will be tried out in the city of Mirage. The accident at the Lingyun system conference that day triggered an emotional entanglement between its founders Zhou Tong, Zhao Feibai, and childhood friends Ayigul, Aizmat. In order to achieve his goals, Zhou Tong closed the "brain consciousness" of Zhao Feibai, Ayigul and Aizmat in the sandbox space of the Lingyun system, but inadvertently triggered the system's "initial intelligent AI" ------Lucoco's start. Everything is connected to the "imprint" game in the memories of the four people that year, an intelligence crisis with the code of "human heart fetters" unfolding between the real and virtual worlds.

(Source: qq.com)

title: Lion x Kamiusagi Rope
synopsis: A collaboration between Kamiusagi Rope and Lion Corporation, a toiletry company for their end-of-the-year toothbrush replacement campaign.

title: Long Wang Dian
synopsis:
Lin Qinghan’s grandfather (her father's father) is facing an imminent danger. His relatives disregarded the stability of Lin conglomerate and used various despicable means to inherit properties owned by him. President Qinghan was framed in the process. However, her husband, Zhang Xuan, who owns the title of "Satan" among the Lords of Dragon King Temple, is resolving everything one by one.

(Source: MU)

title: Long Zhong Ren
synopsis:
Fei Xingkong and Sirui suddenly found themselves living in a comic cage, and they wanted to escape back to the real world. However, facing the absolute control of the "author", the two were forced to flee in the unpredictable world of the story... 

(Source: Bilibili, Google translated)

title: Love Nights! A.D
synopsis:
The anime's story is set in both a celestial realm of angels and demons, as well as Nippon Cultural Broadcasting in the mortal realm. The angels, who use the power of love to protect the peace of the Earth, have their sight set on the "Love Nights!" radio program, so they send rookie angels to Nippon Cultural Broadcasting, and end up fighting the demons that face them. Morikubo, Yoshino, Fukuyama, and Suwabe play the angels and demons in conflict, while Yonaga plays the goddess in the celestial realm who stands neutral in the conflict.

(Source: ANN)

title: Ludi Jian Xian
synopsis:
The top of the immortals, proud of the world, as long as my ancestor An is there, there is the sky. There are three million sword immortals in the world, and they must bow their heads when they meet me. As a sword immortal, I should suppress all enemies in the world. Who claims to be invincible, who claims to be undefeated?

(Source: iQIYI)

title: Luna-tan: 1-mannen no Himitsu
synopsis:
There was a land that kept the prosperity of the world using the energy Mana of the titans called Luna. However, when a tsunami struck the world, the land was destroyed. The story takes place ten thousand years after the huge tsunami in the underground. Mokugyo and Toriiruka are the main characters, who are strange animals. "Why are we here?" "I thought we were in somewhere peaceful..." What exactly happened ten thousand years ago? Can Mokugyou and Toriiruka safely return to the surface?

(Source: MAL News)

title: Lunny-chan to Tanjoubiya-san
synopsis: An adaptation of the picture book Lunny-chan to Tanjoubiya-san.

title: MAFF x Chobitto Zukan
synopsis: A series of collaboration episodes between Chobitto Zukan and JAS.

title: Maiya Wang Ertong Chengzhang Jiaoyu Donghua
Malta no Kamishibai
synopsis: Animated kamishibai-style Malta no Bouken episodes streamed on the official YouTube channel of the franchise.

title: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Motokano datta Picture Drama
title_english: My Stepmom's Daughter Is My Ex Picture Drama
synopsis: Picture drama episodes which were released online on their official YouTube and Twitter channel.

title: Man Huang Xian Jie
synopsis:
In the vast and wild fairyland, the culture of cultivating immortals prevails, and mortals are proud to become cultivators. College student, Lu Hangzhi,  transmigrated from the modern times and became a mortal servant in Ziyun Town. 

He lived a life of treading on thin ice every day, but he refused to accept his fate and worked hard to get rid of his status quo and strived to get ahead. Later, because of a good deed, he was appreciated by Zhu Fuqin, the eldest lady of the Zhu Mansion, and his senior brother Leng Wuya. 

With unremitting efforts, he passed many tests and joined the Xuanxin Sect. He was promoted from an outer disciple to an inner disciple, and was even favored by the deputy head Chen Ji and took him in. He cut his way through obstacles and moved forward on the road of cultivating immortals. 

(source: Qiyi)

title: Mao Zhi Ming 2nd Season
synopsis: Second season of Mao Zhi Ming.

title: Maomao no Hitorigoto 2nd Season
synopsis: Mini anime for Kusuriya no Hitorigoto 2nd Season released on YouTube.

title: Marumofubiyori
synopsis:
Marumofubiyori is a Sanrio universe line introduced in Tokyo's Shinjuku Ward on February 6, 2017. Now with an anime adaptation we see a white bear in a blanket known as Mop and his friends.

(Source: Sanrio Wiki)

title: Mashin Mukashi Banashi Gekijou
synopsis:
A web-exclusive animated short series released on Toei Tokusatsu YouTube Official.

The anime features the deformed versions of Mashin, the vehicular partners of the Kiramager team, reenacting classic folk tales.

title: Matatabi Movie Labo
synopsis: A web series created by Karameru that compiles several of his shorts plus new animation sketches.

title: Matsubara-kun: Mackie E no Ouen Message
synopsis: Matsubara-kun gives his support to Mackie, a fellow Matsubara city mascot, for the 2015 yuru-chara grand prix.

synopsis: A promotional video for the Osaka office of flag Co.

title: Mei Chuxi De Yinyangshi Yijia 3
synopsis: The third season of Meichuxi De Yinyangshi Yijia.

title: Megido 72: Nagaki Sen Tabi no Katawara de
Meigui Gongyu
synopsis:
Xiaoxue, a female photographer who likes traveling, comes to a manor full of red roses for vacation and is attracted by the beautiful scenery. Later, she meets Xun, the handsome and silent owner of the manor. Xun takes good care of Xiaoxue, but he seems to be hiding some secrets.

(Source: Official Site)

title: Meitantei GJ8man: Kieta Shamisen
title_english: Great Detective GJ8man: The Vanished Samisen
synopsis: A special two-part detective spinoff of GJ8man.

title: Meiying Da Leyuan
synopsis:
On the sea far from the world, there is a beautiful and strange island. On this island, there is no division between righteousness and evil, and no thrilling battles. Inhabits on the island is a group of local people who sometimes help each other and sometimes make trouble, but everyone here has a legendary past. This is the peach blossom source of the second dimension world, where the Meiying family lives.

(Source: bilibili)

title: Meng Guo Le Duoduo: Shuiguo Xunzhang
Menghuan Shuyuan 3rd Season
synopsis: Third season of Menghuan Shuyuan.

synopsis: Fourth season of Menghuan Shuyuan.

synopsis: A spin-off of Menghuan Shuyuan.

title: Menghuan Shuyuan: Youxue Ji
synopsis: Second season of Menghuan Shuyuan.

title: Menghuan Xiyou
synopsis: To save the magical realms, a group of warriors rise against a great evil power.

title: Menghuan Xiyou 2
synopsis: A continuation of Menghuan Xiyou.

title: Mengyou Dunhuang
synopsis:
Due to the dissipation of the heavenly scripture powers, Dunhuang will face adversity. Wu Tianji is ordered to repair the heavenly scriptures. In order to perfect the heavenly scripture powers, you need to relive the story originally recorded in the heavenly scripture. Wu Tianji took the god beast, the angel pig, to the ancient city of Dunhuang. Just when she had no idea how to start repairing the scriptures, she accidentally strayed into the world of frescoes in the Mogao Caves...

(Source: bilibili, translated)

title: Mentori
synopsis:
The "Mentori" mascot originates from a series of line stamps meant to evoke the feeling of "mendou da ga toriaezu henshin" (it's annoying, but I guess I'll reply). The anime follows the birds in a gag-filled comedy quite often breaking the 4th wall. 

(Source: ANN)

title: MF Ghost Battle Digest
synopsis: Compilation film re-editing the original MF Ghost into a movie format.

title: Mi Bao Chuanshuo: Bai Cheng Ming Huan You Ji
Mi Nuo de Zhong Er Qingchun
Miao Qiansui de Chengnian Li
synopsis:
Sanwei Mountain is home to an ancient civilization, where Miao Qiansui and her sister Nuluo live. Miao Qiansui is an innocent little girl, full of curiosity about the outside world. In her memory, there has always been a mysterious place called Moon Lake. But is the Moon Lake real? Can she go to Moon Lake smoothly?

(Source: bilibili, translated)

title: Miao Xiansheng: Huo Ze Kui Xiao Ren Chuan
Michiru Rescue!
synopsis:
Four glowing orbs of different color fly through space, chasing after a dark red orb. After a fierce battle, only the blue orb falls to earth, into the room where Michiru is sleeping. But the dark red orb also appears on earth. The orb changes shape into the form of a boy, and starts to illegally raise Mejiro birds. Later, Michiru is at a flea market in a park, when a large flock of Mejiro birds cover the sky, and start attacking people. The yellow, silver, and purple orbs show up and almost manage to calm down the Mejiro, but violence is about to break out again. At that moment, Michiru hears a voice inside her head asking her to save the Mejiro.

(Source: ANN)

title: Microphone Soul Spinners: Kotodama Shoujo
synopsis:
This is "Holy Hierarchy Academy," the world's best girls' high school that trains future stars. Here, the top dog students have all the control, and they possess a unique beverage: the Hierar Milk, extracted from the mythical bovine, the Hierar Beef. One swig from these divine drops bestows enough radiance and go-getter energy that nothing but the position of top dog will satisfy.

Getting it means winning in battle at the academy. This year will feature the highest form of competitive self-expression, the rap battle! This youth story is about four students at the bottom of the hierarchy who meet in a rap battle and climb to to the top!

(Source: ANN)

title: Microphone Soul Spinners: Kotodama Shoujo - Furikaeri Douga
synopsis: Summary of the first 12 episodes of Kotodama Shoujo, aired on the official YouTube channel.

title: Midori no Kuni no Otomodachi: Koeda-chan
synopsis: Based on the Takara Tomy toy line.

title: Midori-chan
synopsis:
Various animated videos for Midori-chan, the mascot of Sammy Co.'s pachislot and pachinko games. The videos are web-exclusive releases on Sammy Co.'s official YouTube channel. Midori-chan was launched in 2016 debuting in her "Nice to meAt you☆" video. A 'full' version was released the following year but contains very little recycled footage, essentially giving her two significantly different debut videos. 

The main purpose of Midori-chan is to promote the Myslot (マイスロ) app which allows people to register their gaming through their mobile device which uses QR Codes to let players see and archive their gaming statistics. It also allows users to win prizes, be ranked against others, play minigames (in the app), collect trophies, and find fellow pachinko friends.

Midori-chan has also gone on to have her own digital 4-koma manga (2 different ones), LINE stickers, a book, and apparel line.

title: Mietchi Cuisine
synopsis:
A cooking show-style animation produced in collaboration with Mietchi Cuisine.
A fun introduction to how to make "Hachis Parmentier," one of the typical French home cooking.

title: Miki no Mikoto
synopsis:
The story of the franchise takes place in a large shopping area called "Yayoimachi" where gods and ayakashi (supernatural monsters) are rumored to appear. The Seishu no Miko (refined sake princes) work at the "Matsuyoian" drinking establishment there as shop-keeps, learning the way of Japan's famed omotenashi (hospitality). 

(Source: ANN)

title: Miki no Mikoto (2020)
synopsis:
Miki no Mikoto is an original project by Bandai Namco Entertainment that personifies different sake varieties into handsome men.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Minna no Okayama-ken
synopsis: An Okayama Prefecture tourism promotional anime. It follows three girls; a monkey, a pheasant, a dog--all companion animals in the folktale Momotarou. Other folktale characters make appearances but the main episode progression is the girls doing things in the city while non-stop chatting about things happening in the city. This shows off efficient public transportation, volunteer work to help others such as blood donation, countryside landscapes that are friendly for the elderly, fun sporting events, etc.

title: Mirai e no Tegami: Kono Michi no Tochuu kara
synopsis:
Gainax's Fukushima-based animation studio is working on a project for Fukushima Prefecture which will highlight the area's recovery efforts since the 2011 Touhoku earthquake and tsunami and the disaster at the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant. 

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title: Mirai kara Yattekita Mori
synopsis:
This is the story of Wales-born C. W. Nicol who restored Japan's desolate forests. Nicol was involved with nature all over the world, including Arctic exploration and the creation of national parks in Ethiopia. He came to Japan, fascinated by the biodiversity of the country, with its drift ice to the north and coral reefs to the south. However, what he saw there were virgin forests being cut down one after another for economic reasons, and rivers being hardened with concrete. After learning that the Afan Argoed Forest Park in Wales had been restored by human hands, Nicol decided to create forests with his own hands to restore nature in Japan. He dreamed of the forests 100 years from now, which he would never be able to see.

(Source: Official site, translated)

title: Miraijin Go Home
synopsis: A person from the future visits a girl on her 16th birthday and asks for her hand in marriage because in the future, the female population has decreased to minimal numbers.

title: Mo Jing Lieren
synopsis: The series takes place on a fantastical world where crystals can provide great strength. Their value has led to to the rise of a unique profession: crystal hunting.

title: Mo Jing Lieren 2nd Season
synopsis: The series takes place on a fantastical world where crystals can provide great strength. Their value has led to to the rise of a unique profession: crystal hunting.

title: Mo Jing Lieren 3rd Season
synopsis: The series takes place on a fantastical world where crystals can provide great strength. Their value has led to to the rise of a unique profession: crystal hunting.

title: Mochimochi Panda
synopsis: Shorts about pandas with stretchy and gummy cheeks just like mochi.

title: Mo Sheng Di Di Xin Shijie
Moffun to Issho
synopsis: A spin-off to the Ousama Sentai King-Ohger TV series, this series portrays the TV show Moffun to Issho, a popular anime within the world of the King-Ohger TV series. These shorts were originally released on the Toei Tokusatsu Fanclub (TTFC) app.

title: Moja to Majo
synopsis:
This is a stop motion animation of the cotton enchantress Moja and the sewing witch. Their day begins with making Moja's body.

(Source: YouTube)

title: Mole Zhuang Yuan: Zhou Bo Ju
Momon's Sand Witch Bangai-hen: Tanu no Kyuujitsu
Momoume
synopsis:
The story revolves around Momo-chan, a 24-year-old rookie office worker, and Ume, a 40-year-old veteran office worker, and depicts office life in a slapstick, laid-back atmosphere that happens with their bosses and colleagues.

(Source: YouTube, translated)

title: Monkey Peak
synopsis:
The anime centers on a group of pharmaceutical company employees who embark on a mountain-climbing trip together and who encounter tragedy at the hands of mysterious monkeys when they reach the top. 

(Source: ANN)

title: Mono no Kamisama Cocotama
synopsis: New Cocotama series, to be streamed on YouTube channel.

title: Monster Strike Anime: Masamune - Shimei no Akaki Yaiba
Mori no Kaori x Kamiusagi Rope
synopsis: A collaboration between Kamiusagi Rope and Nipponham's Mori no Kaori product line. Meant to showcase sausages, bacon, ham, etc. that have a rustic  forest flavor with no added colors and reduced sodium. Episodes were available to view by entering a code online that was given on the inner label of a Mori no Kaori's product package.

title: Mortal Portal Radio
synopsis:
This program is a story in different dimension about the struggles of m-flo who are researching the wormhole at the Global Astro Kombinat.

(Source: YouTube)

title: Moshi Meta: Moshi Joshikousei ga Metaverse de Miko ni Nattara
Moshimoshi, Terumi desu.
synopsis:
The story depicts the everyday life of Terumi-san, who dislikes the internet and works at a telephone company called Moshimoshi Dou, and middle school student Rintarou, who is in love with her.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Mottainai Baasan
synopsis:
In the books, the titular Grandma seeks to explore the true meaning of the Japanese phrase "mottainai" after her son asked her what it meant and she couldn't answer. "Mottainai" is a commonly used exclamation that roughly translates to "what a waste!", expressing regret over wastefulness. The Grandma seeks to explore the meaning and importance of "mottainai" in the story.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: Motto Shitte Fukushima!
synopsis: Tourism promotional videos for the Fukushima Prefecture. It features an Akabeko (a legendary red cow from the Aizu region, and mascot of the Fukushima Prefecture) spouting a 6-second fact about the area in a pun-rhyming-poem style. At the start of every year new batches of episodes are released on the official YouTube channel of Fukushima Prefecture. In 2019, 25 eps were released and for 2020, 59 eps were released.

title: Mou Inu Chuui
synopsis:
A short anime about a very cute animal called a dog. It has a cute face and also says dirty jokes! It's not just cute!

(Source: Official site, translated)

title: Mouretsu 50 Ototarou
synopsis: A short web series to celebrate the 50th anniversary of Akatsuka Fujio's  gag manga Mouretsu Atarou. The episodes were posted to the official Akatsuka Fujio website and Twitter account.

title: Moyashimon Returns: Kin Gekijou Shutchou-ban
synopsis: Short specials released online and later included in the BD/DVD vol 1.

title: Mr. Men Little Miss
synopsis: Sanrio's rendition of the Mr. Men and Little Miss British book franchise. Each episode is focused on one of the characters while a narrator exuberantly explains their actions.

title: Mr. Shape and Number Man
synopsis:
On one snowy day, Mr. Shape living in the Shape World stumbled upon shapes of numbers, scattered on the snow. Suddenly, all the numbers assembled and became Number Man.
As soon as Number Man set eyes on Mr. Shape, he started to go after Mr. Shape. Startled, Mr. Shape started to run. Number Man kept following him. Run Mr. Shape!… Number Man followed, Mr. Shape run...Number Man followed. A strange chase in snow started all of a sudden, with an unexpected twist at the end!

(Source: Official Vimeo Channel)

title: Mu Guang Xiawu Cha
synopsis: Mini-drama recaps for the Chinese release of Phantom in the Twilight.

title: Mu Wang Zhi Wang: You Du Zhan
synopsis:
The 12th year of the Tai Calendar Luo Wuzi was ordered to build the Tomb of King Qin. Then he was given the title King of the Tomb. After building it, he became the King of the Tomb City and ruled over the Tomb of the World.

Since then The tomb sect in Jianghu is in its heyday. But then, The Tomb sect is split. King of the Tombs heir, Mu Rong Shi may be a Tomb Guards Sect. The Luo family ran away, and build the Luo Family Ancestral Hall as a separate faction and is understood because of the Tomb Attackers Sect.

When the Two sects meet If a subsequent generation of the Tomb Attacker Sect succeeded in getting Tomb Destruction Orders at the Nine-Locked Chain Tomb they’ll get the King’s Tomb Throne. For thousands of years both the good Sect, the Tomb Attacker Sect, and therefore, the Tomb Guards Sect very difficult to separate. To the present day, king Palace deliberately put treasure within the tomb. Tomb Guards Sect, Mu Rong Xian, to point out his loyalty he smuggled the tomb guard against the outside.

(Source: Kurina Official)

title: Mukashibanashi Dokkiri Anime
synopsis: CoroCoro Comic's Yarisugi!!! Itazura-kun, in honor of it's 3rd manga volume going on sale, received web shorts on CoroCoro Comic's official YouTube channel. Itazura-kun loves pranks and thinks about them 24/7. These web shorts are Itazura-kun's re-imagining of classic folktales such as Cinderella and Momotarou.

title: Musabi Daibakuhatsu
synopsis: A short film directed by Keiichirou Watanabe with the Eizou Kenkyuubu.

title: Mushinin
synopsis: Bandai's new toy line for boys: Mushinin. It combines bugs (mushi) and ninja (nin). The anime follows the various characters as they train in their ninja arts at a local playground.

title: Musunde Hiraite
synopsis:
A collection of high school love stories, each chapter featuring a different student. For example, Hiro has a crush on a cute upperclassman girl, but she has rejected his advances 15 times! Will Hiro be able to find a way into her heart? His friend Akechi keeps a notebook of information on all the girls at school, but when he goes after the secrets of an incredibly quiet and shy girl, will his interest become more than professional curiosity?

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi Er
Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi Er 2nd Season
Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi Er 3rd Season
Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi Er 4th Season
Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi Er: Fanwai Pian
Na Nian Na Tu Naxie Shi Er 5th Season
Nagano Toshi Gas x Kamiusagi Rope
synopsis:
A collaboration between Kamiusagi Rope and Nagano City Gas. The individual episodes were shown for 1 week on Nagano Broadcasting Systems official YouTube channel and website. Then later on the following Mezamashi Doyoubi (Saturday) broadcast.

The goal was to inform people that Nagano City Gas' office has a wide variety of services such as a showroom showcasing remodeled gas kitchens, how to make sure you aren't losing money from bathroom heating, etc.

title: Nakado Riku Animation: Hijouyou Mochidashi Bukuro wo Youi Shiyou
synopsis: For the 8th anniversary of the Great East Japan Earthquake, Fukushima Prefecture support character Nakado Riku and her friends teach us how to prepare an earthquake survival kit.

title: Nanatsumi Project: Sono Ichi
synopsis:
This is a world where demons live, where the night continues all the time.
Children are studying at school to threaten humans every day.
A story of a small day in such a world.

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

title: Nanchatte!
synopsis: A satire gag story about politics for adults.

title: Nandemo Bakukai! Koyori-chan
synopsis: A series of shorts starring Hakui Koyori that ends with a bang!

title: Neko Neko Gong Show
synopsis: A collaboration between Kihara Yousuke and studio dwarf. Kihara is most famous for being the head artist for the PS2/GameCube game Ribbit King and the anime Nikoniko♪Connie-chan. Neko Neko Gong Show is a talent show for cats, where if their skits are bad, get a gong (made from a cat food tin can lid) hit to boot them off.

title: Nekoronde Mite ne.
synopsis: Poo, Raa, and Sue promote various things. Episode 1 for example promotes Lupin III TV special and Meitantei Conan's film while episode 3 promotes the Music Dragon LIVE 2013 event.

title: New Jersey and Enterprise's Beach Vacation
synopsis:
Commanders, join the shipgirls for a seaside getaway!

(Source: YouTube)

title: Ni De Rensheng Shi Wo Lai Chi Le
synopsis:
In the name of "sister", Jiang Lan adopted Gu Chi, who no one wanted to take care of, and became a ray of light in Gu Chi's dark life. Gu Chi also gradually fell in love with this beautiful "sister". Will the age gap hinder the development of their relationship? How will the domineering "sister" respond to the "brother's" confession? 

(Source: Bilibili, Google translated)

title: Ni Yian Jian Shen
synopsis:
This is a world that only the strongest gets to rule. The ancient alchemy is about to rip a hole in the universe while the flaming sword of heaven is going to put an end to the cycle of lives. Rulers of thousands of realms are killed by one that has the bloodline of Titan. Qin Nan, the chosen one, who has cultivated an invincible martial art, has embarked on the road to eternity by defeating countless geniuses and dominating the heavens!

(Source: Chineseanime.co.in)

title: Nihon e Youkoso Elf-san Mini Anime
synopsis: Mini anime featuring chibi characters from Nihon e Youkoso Elf-san, streamed on the official X account and Toei Video Youtube channel.

title: Nihon e Youkoso Elf-san Mini Anime
synopsis: Mini anime featuring chibi characters from Nihon e Youkoso Elf-san, streamed on the official X account and Toei Video Youtube channel.

title: Nikuiyo! Galbi-kun: Kemuri ga Me ni Shimiru
synopsis: A short gag anime about yakiniku meat on a grill. It primarily focuses on Galbi-kun (beef short rib) who admires a higher cut of meat and tries to change his demeanor to be more refined.

title: Ninja Box
synopsis:
In the anime's story, Hiroto longs to build a secret base near his house, and in his house's storeroom he meets a ninja and "Nintuber" named Tonkachi. Tonkachi, who knows about the existence of the "Ninja Box," forces Tonkachi to go to the "Village of Tatemakuri," where they meet a talking dog named Tatezou. 

(Source: ANN)

title: Ninja Box 3rd Season
synopsis: A new mini season of Ninja Box. They expand upon the random everyday encounters of the kids. According to the official YouTube channels, this is the "season 3" of the franchise and the episodes will have irregular release schedule.

title: No Guns Life Mini
synopsis: Mini anime for the first and second seasons of No Guns Life.

title: No More Princes
synopsis:
This is the legendary tale of valiant princes, devoting their lives to rescue the princess from the evil drake that has been terrorizing the nation…
"Here I am, my damsel in distress, I will smite the dragon and return you back to the golden castle!"
when the brave prince roars his promise, our beautiful princess Mikaella asks the question to drake.
"Xeno, I don't want to be saved by him... Please take care of him."
The mighty "evil" dragon responds, "Anything for my sweet Mikaella."

(Source: Pocket Comics)

title: Noah Dongwu Zhensuo Bingli Jilu Bu
Noah's Animal Clinic Medical Book Record
Nono-chan Theater
synopsis: Animated shorts focusing on the Yamada family.

title: Norasco
synopsis: Follows an easygoing Scottish Fold's mundane everyday life.

title: Norasco: The Stray Scottish Fold
synopsis:
A short story depicting the daily life of Kotarou, a stray Scottish Fold who lives in Tateishi, Katsushika, Tokyo, and the townspeople.

(Source: YouTube, translated)

title: Noratorium
synopsis: A chicken lays a series of eggs, each one hatching a different kind of baby animal, which gets into mischief.

title: Nui Story 2
synopsis: Second season of Nui Story.

title: Nuiguru Papa
synopsis: Dad becomes a stuffed animal.

title: Nunchi Eobsneun Dolsoe
synopsis:
Haeun is a nobleman who falls hard for Dullseh, his gorgeous, but extremely clueless manservant. Dullseh's impressive build reminds Haeun of the sexy men from gay erotica that he loves so much. Exams and career ambitions be damned—he just can't get Dullseh out of his mind! Silly hijinks ensue as Haeun will do whatever it takes to lure the hunky Dullseh into his bedchamber and possibly... his heart?!

(Source: Tapas Media)

title: Nushen You Dian Ling
synopsis:
Yao Ling and Hu Xiaozhen, who parted ways due to a misunderstanding in childhood, reunited in the academy after they grew up. The infatuated female protagonist hopes to continue writing a sweet journey with the male protagonist, but due to the appearance of the mysterious administrator, Ma Shen, "accidents" occur frequently. Under the lure of Ma Shen's plan, the two became acting administrators and they help spirits to realize their long-cherished dreams, in order to continue their progress in love. Through the experience of missions again and again, the relationship between Hu and Yao becomes deeper and deeper, and they are moving towards the road of righteousness. But the true purpose of Ma Shen gradually implicates the operating laws behind the world, and more mysteries, and dangers lie between the hero and heroine. 

(Source: Bilibili, Google translated & edited)

title: Nusheng Sushe Richang
synopsis:
"Girls' Dorm Daily" takes place in a unique college dorm and revolves around four girls from different family backgrounds and with different understandings and pursuits of college life. It is a story full of joy and youth.

(Source: Academy of Arts & Design, Tsinghua University)

title: Nusheng Sushe Richang 2nd Season
synopsis: Second season of Nusheng Sushe Richang.

title: Observing Elena Evoy
synopsis:
"If you're not my rival, why do I feel this way?" Blessed with both beauty and brains, it was only natural for Johann to be the top student at the Academy - that is until Elena Evoy appears. To make things worse, she seems completely unfazed by his charms, shattering his self-esteem. So why can't he stop thinking about her?

(Source: Manta)

title: Ochibi-san Tanpen Movie
synopsis: Short videos to commemorate the releases of volumes 9 and 10 of Ochibi-san.

title: Ohiru no Shocker-san
synopsis:
Centers on the everyday struggles of the lackeys of Shocker, the villain organization in the original Kamen Rider series.

(Source: ANN)

title: Ometeotl Hero
synopsis:
In the year 22XX, due to the drastic decrease in the human population, the government starts accepting races from other allied planets. As a result of genetic mixing, new species are born with special powers. A young man named Yuuki learns on his 18th birthday that while his father is a member of the "hero" tribe, his mother is a member of a tribe of beings who can manipulate plants who were supposedly wiped out due to the accelerated mechanization of the planet. As a result, Yuuki holds powers of both tribes, but he questions which side he should help with his powers.

(Source: ANN)

title: Omoide wo Hakobu Uta
synopsis: Film by Takashi Muramatsu.

title: Onaka ga Guuguu Island
synopsis:
This is Guuguu Island, a magical island where the Yakiniku King menu items live. Meat, vegetables, mulberries, sweets... there's all kinds of delicious food! Calvin the apprentice galbi has a dream to become "Yakiniku King's most popular menu item"! To achieve that, he is happily flying around the universe with his adorable friends. Will Calvin and his friends be able to become Yakiniku King's most popular menu items? Aim for a delicious serving! Aim for a delicious Yakiniku King!

(Source: YouTube, translated)

title: Onegai Patron-sama!
synopsis:
The story centers on hero pair teams named "Patraisers," consisting of "Sugars" and their supporter "Patrons." The Patraiser teams "reinvigorate people's frozen hearts."

The "main story" videos will focus on a single Patraiser pair, consisting of the Sugar Asahi Yuga and his Patron Ryouya Nekoyashiki. The "side story" videos will focus on their daily lives, as well as the other characters.

(Source: ANN)

title: Onegai Patron-sama! Episode 0
synopsis: The encounter between Asahi and Ryouya.

title: Onegai! Wooper Looper
synopsis: The first work by Piso Studio.

title: Oni no Hanayome wa Taberaretai
synopsis:
When she was young, Mashiro's life was saved by an oni. Turning 17, the ripe age to be eaten, she goes to marry him. However, he ends up doting on her excessively and has no intention to eat her?! The story of two unconsciously lovey-dovey newlyweds.

(Source: Hakusensha, translated)

title: Orangeback + Hoo-D Pilot
synopsis: Pilot film for an original series project involving the animator Seo-Ro Oh (Osro) and Dalgona Entertainment. It was released on Seo-Ro Oh's official YouTube channel.

title: Ore no 1-shuukan
synopsis: The daily life of artist Onkun Suko.

title: Oshamani
synopsis: Fashionable, hipster, and ironic--these gruff voiced kawaii characters star in a new web anime from Kamio Japan.

title: Oshiete Hokusai! The Animation
synopsis:
Tenkorin Okakura is a high school slacker girl. While dreaming of a painter god, she makes a wish that her dreams can come true without practice or effort. The god Raijin hears her wish, summons real-life historical artists, and tells Tenkorin to have these artists teach her so that she can fulfill her dreams. Guided by their teachings, Tenkorin aims to become a real painter with a promising future.

(Source: ANN)

title: Oshiete♡Namie-sensei!
synopsis:
In order to promote industry that was lost in the Fukushima disaster, the prefecture is improving the robotics test field with the aim of obtaining the next generation of workers in a "robot related industry." 

These two episodes are aimed at elementary schoolers and talk about drones as well as the robotics campus.

title: Osiris no Tenbin: Season 2
synopsis: 2nd Season to Osiris no Tenbin.

title: Otaku-chans
synopsis:
A short anime made exclusively for the social media platform. Titled Otakuchanzu, the simple story follows two idol-obsessed cats: Riri and Popo.

(Source: ANN)

title: Otsukare Oyasumi, Yumeko.
synopsis: A short film by Haruka Suzuki.

title: Oumaga Parade
synopsis:
The sky to the west is dyed in amber, and the sky to the east is a halo.
Something is coming to the city from the depths of the other end.

(Source: Official Website, translated)

title: Owara Nai Chinkonka wo Utaou: Seinen no Uta
synopsis: Kota has become a shinigami and his job is to follow a man at the end of his ropes. Slowly Kota learns about the man's life and what led him to this point.

title: Pa-ri Nezumi-kun
synopsis: A hedgehog for the first time in history is a professional baseball player! Or is it?

title: Pan to Boku no Momo-chan
synopsis:
The story follows a boy named Shiro and his aunt, Momo, who live together after the death of Shiro's mother, Momo's older sister. Shiro makes bread for Momo in the mornings. 

(Source: ANN)

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie De Jin Yugang
Pao Fu Xiaojie: Gan Ai Ji
Pao Fu Xiaojie: Hua Yang Ji
Peeping Life x I-O Data: Quiz!! Input Output
synopsis: A collaboration with the Peeping Life franchise and I-O Data (a Japanese computer peripheral manufacturer).

title: Peeping Life x Sanyo
synopsis: A Peeping Life and Sanyo collaboration made to promote Sanyo's summer ocean themed pachinko line with a Momotarou Densetsu pachinko game machine.

title: Phantom in the Twilight Recap
synopsis: A short recap of the first ten episodes of Phantom in the Twilight.

title: Phantomi: Mini Anime
synopsis:
A simplistic chibi anime side-stories to the tokusatsu show Secret × Heroine Phantomirage!. 

Kokomi, Saki, and Yotsuba are three middle schoolers and friends who lead different lifestyles. One day, they meet Kumachi, a talking teddy bear fairy sent by her master Phandy to search for the wish-granting artifacts, the "Reverse Jewels" that can corrupt a human's heart. Kumachi later chooses them to become Phantomirage, a Robin Hood-styled phantom thieves of justice to acquire the Reverse Jewels with the promise of granting their own wishes. The Phantomirage proceed in this by purifying people who are corrupted by the Gyakugyaku-Police, a group of bad cops who use the Reverse Jewels to turn those they arrest into "Ikenaiers", an evil polarized versions of themselves. Becoming mass media sensations while attracting the attention of the actual police who are investigating them and the Gyakugyaku-Police, the Phantomirage members are warned to conceal their identities from the public. 

(Source: Wiki)

title: Pi Zhe Lang Pi De Yang
synopsis:
Web-writer Lai Xiaoguang accidentally entered a virtual world called "The Hand of God." In this fantasy world, she turned into a werewolf named Da Niu and was involved in a national treasure theft case. In order to investigate the truth, she had to embark on a journey with Wang Cai the Goat King.

(Source: Bilibili, Google translated & edited)

title: Pipilu Anquan Tegong Dui 2nd Season
synopsis: Second season of Pipilu Anquan Tegong Dui.

title: Pochitto Hatsumei: Pikachin-Kit
synopsis:
An "episode 0" streamed before the main series' release. The protagonist Eiji assembles "cunninglasses" so he can read his classmate's note about the boy she likes. In the end, he finds the last piece needed to make the glasses work, and reads her note that says "Eiji is pretty weird." 

(Source: ANN)

title: PokeMinutes
synopsis: A series of videos showcasing snapshots of time spent with different Pokemon.

title: Pokemon Peaceful Place
synopsis:
Pokepeace is a small town somewhere in the world. There was a share house where Pokemon and humans gathered. Living here is a leisurely and free life. Nap together or have a party on a special day. "Peace" life of Pokemon. Why don't you take a look?

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

title: Pole Princess!! Self Introduction
synopsis: Self-introductions for each character posted to the official YouTube Channel.

title: Ponkotsu Quest Specials
synopsis: Ponkotsu Quest web specials are not a part of the original series' episode count. They contain original footage and dialogue. Most of the DVD announcement specials are excluded from this entry due to no new footage.

title: Ponkotsu Quest x Monsterz
synopsis: A collaboration promotion between the Ponkotsu Quest anime and the Monsterz live action horror film (which is a remake of a South Korean film titled  Haunters) airing in theaters.

title: Ponkotsu Quest x Momoume
synopsis: A collaboration between Ponkotsu Quest and Momoume.

title: Ponkotsu Quest: Maou to Haken no Mamono-tachi
Pont Qiao Booth
synopsis: Anime uploaded to YouTube based on studio Bridge's original characters, Pont and Qiao.

title: Porong Porong Sang-eo Bimiljagjeon
synopsis:
Pororo and friends decided to travel in the sea, which is full of various fish friends, pretty corals and seaweeds! Besides, there's a coral playground ! Fish friends told us not to go to coral playground, but Crong and I wanted to sneak in. But...what we met there was the horrible shark! Aah! Wait! I think the shark is hiding something. What is the secret story that the sharks want to tell us?

(Source: Amazon Prime)

title: Pororo Gonchung Daemoheom
synopsis:
One sunny day, Pororo played hide and seek with his new friend Bomi. Suddenly, they saw a strange light and turned small like bugs! After that, they met a honey bee 'Haney' who wants to become a singer. Haney is so bad at singing but she feels so happy while singing. Will Haney become a singer? Can Pororo and Bomi finish their adventure and successfully come back to home?

(Source: Amazon Prime)

title: Pororo Gonglyong Ppyeoga Sal-anassda!
title_english: Pororo Movie: Pororo's Night at the Dinosaur Museum
synopsis:
One early morning, Pororo and his friends visit the nature history museum. Suddenly, the museum starts to shake, and the exhibits begin to tumble down! TongTong's magic spell misfires, and all of the exhibits come to life. Can our friends set everything back as they are? Come along for a wild museum adventure with Pororo and his friends!

(Source: Amazon Prime)

title: Pororo Gonglyong-woldeu
synopsis:
Oh my gosh! A scary giant dinosaur ordered the pink dino Kong to bring one of Pororo's friends back to his planet. Their invasion to the Earth has begun! Meanwhile, the great inventor Eddy finishes his work on new outfits for the Pororo heroes. The outfits have some special power that will help the heroes to fight against dino Kong. Would the Pororo heroes be able to defeat the dinosaurs?

(Source: Amazon Prime)

title: Pororo Gonglyong-woldeu 2
synopsis:
Finally, Pororo Heroes 2 is coming!! A scary giant dinosaur ordered the pink dino Kong to bring one of Pororo's friends back to his planet. Would the Pororo heroes be able to defeat the dinosaurs and save their friend?

(Source: Amazon Prime)

title: Pororo Jyulagi Gujodae
synopsis:
Stop, there!! Hellus saurus! Here comes the Pororo Jurassic Rescue Squad to save dino eggs and the world from the bad scientist Hellus Saurus! Hey, friends! Please support Pororo and friends so they can defeat Hellus!!

(Source: Amazon Prime)

title: Pororo Loopy Moheom
synopsis:
Oh, no!! Pororo's friends are taken by the Giant!! However, Pororo and Loopy continue fighting because they are so different! Can Pororo and Loopy finish their adventure and successfully save their friends?

(Source: Amazon Prime)

title: Pororo Mabeobsa 2: Dragon Gisaga Doeeola
title_english: Pororo the Wizard 2: Be a Dragon Knight!
synopsis:
Pororo becomes the Dragon Knight Wizard! Meet the newest movie to the Pororo the Wizard Series!

(Source: Amazon Prime)

title: Pororo Mabeobsa: Jeonseol-ui Mabeobbong-eul Jikyeola
title_english: Pororo the Wizard: Guardians of the Legendary Magic Wand
synopsis:
Pororo and friends are on their magical program at a magic school led by Professor Tongtong. He is a well-known wizard around the town. They learn how to use magic wands, how to fly around on broomsticks, and more! All of a sudden, an evil wizard appears and threatens Tongtong for a hidden legendary magic wand. The evil wizard captures Tongtong in a glass ball and takes him.

(Source: Amazon Prime)

title: Pow Pow Bing: Pow Pow Xiang Qian Chong
Powerful Pro Yakyuu: Powerful Koukou-hen
synopsis:
The story will center around a protagonist who goes to Powerful High School to achieve his dreams of being a baseball player. There, he reunites with a childhood friend named Subaru Hoshii, who he promised to play at the Summer Koshien high school championship game with in the past, but who seems to have forgotten their promise.

(Source: ANN)

title: Ppyojogma-eul-ui Susanghan Iusdeul
synopsis: A spin-off series for Ppyojogppyojog Pokeugajog.

title: Ppyojogppyojog Pokeugajog
synopsis:
The Forks with Spiky Hands is a comedic and a gothic styled animated series, starring an unusual family that is sure to leave a lasting impression.
The Fork family has pointy forks as hands, and their sharp hair make them unique in their appearances.
The main character, Tilly, is a very mature girl that dreams of becoming the main character of a horror story.

Mr. Fork, the father, doesn't wear a tie to work, but instead wears a noose. Unlike his looks, he is a warmhearted and a loving father.
Mrs. Fork makes cupcakes out of the most unusual ingredients that leaves you questioning whether it's edible, even for animals.
Chabby, the little brother, interacts very closely with animals and befriends them more than people.

The series depicts the daily lives of Tilly and her spooky family in a satirical tone that the viewers are sure to fall in love with.

(Source: WelCon)

title: Prepare
synopsis:
In this short animation, Luna, a girl who is uncomfortable with hospitals, medicine and injections, comes to understand the value of medicine via the thrilling explanations of a mysterious doctor.

(Source: NHK World-Japan)

title: Puru Pom
synopsis: A short web series to promote LINE's tile-matching mobile game PURU POM.

title: Qian Wu Guren
synopsis:
The smartest man, Luo Xiao, and the affluent prince, Yan An Cheng, wander from place to place to find clues about the legendary “Heavenly Stairway”. They encounter many bizarre cases along the way, and gradually, they uncover a hidden conspiracy...

(Source: Baka-Updates)

title: Qin Shi Mingyue: Chunjie Tebie Pian
synopsis: An episode that was released to celebrate Chinese New Year.

title: Qin Shi Mingyue: Canghai Hengliu
title_english: Qin's Moon: The High Waves of Canghai

title: Qing Chi Hong Xiaodou Ba! Shiwu Shijie
synopsis:
Have you ever wondered where uneaten food goes? Wasted food actually goes to a world that belongs only to food, which is simply called the "Food City." Food is cleaned, disinfected and repaired here, and then returns to the human world to "go to work" and reappear in human bowls! Red Bean is just a red bean that is not eaten day after day... But one day, an accident happened! While Red Bean was working diligently, a human diner suddenly got food poisoning, and Red Bean became the object of suspicion by the Food Inspection Bureau...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title: Quanqiu Gao Wu
synopsis:
The 28-year-old Fang Ping was accidentally reborn in a parallel world in 2008, returning to his 18-year-old high school self. This is a world composed of a warrior system, where warriors have extremely high social status and rights. Due to the coincidence of fate with Emperor Zhan Tian in his previous life, a martial arts system was generated in Fang Ping's body after his rebirth. He can convert rare props of any value into martial arts value by touching them, and improve a series of abilities such as bones, tendons, flesh, blood, and mental strength at a speed beyond ordinary people. Through the system's golden finger and his own mind, Fang Ping successfully entered Modu Wuke University for further studies, and in the years to come, he continued to complete his self-growth. Faced with unknown difficulties, he gradually realized the responsibilities that warriors need to bear and the mission of protecting family, friendship, and love.

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)

(Source: bilibili, translated)

title: Renwu Dashi
synopsis:
This is an adventure story about Ah Shu and Ah Lang. Ah Shu is the executor of the mission, and Ah Lang is the intermediary of the "Task Association," specifically looking for tasks for Ah Rat. While the two were constantly completing various difficult tasks, Ah Shu revealed his yearning for something indescribable – "The Sea of ​​Stars"; while Ah Lang was also looking for clues to the disappearance of the family during various tasks. The two learned from the mission that in addition to the present world, there is an "upper world," and various signs indicate that Ah Shu's yearning and the clues Ah Lang is looking for point directly to the "upper world," even "more upper world."

Through their continuous adventures, they gradually learned that no matter which world, they cannot escape the fate of the tipping point of entropy.

(Source: bilibili, translated)

One day, twelve amulets that protect the world are shattered. By whom? While the curse of shattered pieces is spreading to people around the world, for some reason there is only one person who is not under the curse. That is Rokuro. Rokuro sets on a journey with his big brother Goro and younger sister Nanako to save their family and eventually the world. With a magic brush that he got from a hermit, Rokuro's great adventure starts! 

(Source: Official Site)

title: Ruguo Lishi Shi Yiqun Miao 8th Season
synopsis:
Eighth season of Ruguo Lishi Shi Yiqun Miao, where twelve cats play historical figures to tell short chronological stories that cover the entire five thousand-year history of China.  

This eighth instalment covers the defining moments of the mid- to late-Tang Dynasty, including Emperor Xuanzong's reign, the An Lushan Rebellion and the Huang Chao Rebellion, leading to the eventual downfall of the imperial Tang dynasty.

title: Safari Bus Tayo
synopsis:
Tayo transformed into a safari bus and went on a safari adventure in Africa with Duri the little explorer! They save the baby lion in danger, shared the wonderful moment the baby giraffe was born, and even met a group of hyenas led by the wonderful queen!

Let's share the exciting Tayo and Duri's adventure to meet various animals on the safari!

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

title: Saikyou Kamizmode!
synopsis:
Dai Mugen once held an unmatched passion for playing the drums. However, after being defeated by rival drummer Rin Tanba in a competition, he is left questioning where his heart lies and quits as a result.

One day, Dai has a fateful encounter with a strange creature named Goutetsu, a self-proclaimed "god." Spotting the boy's hidden potential, Goutetsu quickly appoints Dai as his "oyakata"—a coach who can guide Goutetsu in the world of "kamizumo," the battles between gods through sumo wrestling. Within kamizumo matches, the gods are powered through the drumbeats struck by their oyakata, which forces Dai to pick up the mallets once more.

As the duo slowly racks up victories, Dai confronts his self-doubts and reignites his passion in the new endeavor to stand on kamizumo's topmost stage.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Saitama-ken Zaijuu, Fujiyama Osamu, 33-sai, Mushoku (NEET).: Fujilog Nyuumon-hen
synopsis: The original Fujilog ONA series before making it big with a TV series.

title: Sakkai Eightraid
synopsis:
The story takes place in a universe where countless parallel universes known exist. There is always a link — called "Prism" — connecting the modern world and these parallel worlds, and sometimes energy and substance comes through. One day, monsters known as "Eight" come from a parallel world and begin attacking. Humanity begins its counterattack using a power called "Skuld," which harnesses the power of tomorrow. The government gathers Skuld users into an army known as "Norn," but the Eight still wreak destruction over the years. Then, a boy named Asuma who can use an ancient weapon is discovered. 

(Source: ANN)

title: San Cun Renjian
synopsis:
In a different world with strong spiritual energy, Wang Baole, a warm and cheerful little fat man, saw through the illusion created by the teachers in the entrance examination of the famous school "Dragon Taoist Academy", and won high scores with his excellent performance, and obtained the "Magic Department". The quota of specially recruited students has since overcame obstacles and opened up his own way of upgrading. In the process of cultivating immortals and fighting monsters, he made a large number of close friends, and thus started a series of hilarious adventure stories.

(Source: bilibili)

title: San Jian Hao Zhi Ban Mian Ren
synopsis:
This animation epic tells the story of the guardians of the "Heavenly Martial Treasure" of Genghis Khan, who protected it during the "Tumu Crisis" in the Ming Dynasty. After the massacre of the guardians in one night, the young lord Wuyunzong, the sole survivor of the guardians, seeks revenge and searches for the treasure. Along the way, he encounters a series of thrilling adventures involving pursuit and growth, love and friendship, conspiracy and betrayal.

(Source: TMDB)

title: Sanguo Sha: Taiping Tianshu
synopsis:
The Grand Prize Challenge was born, and the talented player Guo Xiaoye, who had been suspended for two years due to a frame-up, once again challenged the top. In order to prove that he has regained his original intention, he and his natural general Guo Jia passed the test, but discovered a shocking conspiracy during the game - the damage in the game can actually be transmitted to real players!

(Source: Tencent, Google translated)

The experience notes of the A-bomb victims which will be the base for the animation are ones sent to NHK's annual reciting, a program to read and share their experience, which have been running as long as 9 years now. A total of 2,200 notes have been sent to us so far.

A mysterious crow appears there and travels together as a guide to guide the brother and sister to the owner of the feathers. Is it possible to find a brother or sister who searches for the owner of feathers through encounters with various birds?

title: Aware! Meisaku-kun: Q&A Corner
synopsis:
An Aware! Meisaku-kun question & answer corner. These shorts are web-exclusives. Fans of the TV series can mail in their questions about the characters or past events in the show and select ones will be answered by the characters themselves through the web shorts. 

It is recommended to view the web shorts after episode 93 of the TV series as a non-antagonistic Tsurukou is present to answer questions.

title: Aware! Meisaku-kun: Short Douga
synopsis:
Web-exclusive shorts of Aware! Meisaku-kun where the characters wonder what the next grade will be like. 

The first episode, they wonder what 7th grade will be like. At the end of the 2nd season (aka episode 78) in the main anime, the students graduated the 6th grade. The short breaks the 4th wall as the characters also request the viewer to continue watching the show with the 3rd season starting on April 6th, 2018.

The second episode follows a similar structure. The kids just graduated 8th grade at the end of season 4 (ep 156) and reminsce about their favorite events that occurred. They hope the viewers will continue watching their soon to be final year of middle school starting on April 3rd, 2020.

title: Baby
synopsis:

They all dream of Utopia in which they can love each other and have a positive attitude toward the world without being tied down by rules and a grade of rank.

(Source: Vimeo)

Bai Fa Shen La
synopsis:
Shen La, a special investigator of the "Poll Bureau" of the mysterious incident management agency, was seriously injured in the execution of his mission. When he was about to die, he accepted the inheritance of Wu Rendi, the director of the Sixth Office - a "seed" containing mysterious power. After regaining consciousness, Wu Rendi's senior brother Guangren accepted him as his disciple. In order to find the fragments of the Tianli Diagram, Shen La, after going through the Tianshan Wolf Tomb, energy backlash, foundation conspiracy and other incidents, was finally recognized by Wu Rendi and received the ancient artifact-the Twin Swords of Crime and Punishment given by him. At the same time, the problem of the insider in the polling bureau became more complicated and confusing, and Shen La and her partner Sun Desheng went into battle again.

(Source: Bilibili, Google translated)

title: Bai Jia Jue Zhi: Jianghu Gui Shi Lu
synopsis:
In the future city, science and robots have become necessities in people's lives. The research, development and use of technology maintain a delicate balance between the scientific ethics committee, the technology chaebol, and the third-party security system company Mosh. Wang Xiaoyun, the only son of the Wang Group, was assassinated by an illegal robot while he was out hunting. Everyone in his entourage was spared. The balance of power has been broken, and the undercurrent is surging. 

Bai Wuxie, captain of the 24th Operation Team in charge of public security, found Zhang Bingyi and Shang Weiyang, consultants who are good at mechanical networks, to assist in the investigation. After several on-site investigations, it was discovered that the murderer turned out to be a product of the "robot oligarchy" Aibozer Company. 

At the same time, Mosh also encountered a security crisis, and everything seemed to be driven by someone behind the scenes. Zhang Bingyi, Bai Wuxie and Mo Shangshuang from Mosh Company were forced to form a special operations team to find out the truth behind the scenes.

(Source: iQIYI, translated)

title: Bai Shou Zong Dong Yuan: Konglong Yongshi Dang An

Arihisa Aokura needs money. He needs money in order to support his family of orphans and earn a living at the same time. Looking online for potential employees, he finds a posting for a part time job in an "evil organization." Seeing that the pay and benefits were fairly substantial, he took the chance and took the interview. He was somehow hired and now has to work as a henchman inside the evil organization "Antares." Will he be able to survive the onslaught of missions against heroes while providing for his orphan brothers and sisters?

(Source: MangaHelpers)

(Source: ANN)

title: Bo & To's
synopsis:
Mr. A is a kindhearted man who runs a coffee shop. He doesn’t have many customers but his regulars truly appreciate his coffee. He has a cat named Bori. Mr. A adopts two more street cats, Toto and Mozzi. He enjoys his new companions. Yet, at some point, the number of stray animals in the neighborhood begin to increase, and unusual things start happening.

(Source: Official Site)

title: Boku to, Hanasou.
synopsis: An experimental short by Takahiro Shibata.

title: Bokura no Ashita: Freeter no Genjou ni Kansuru Wakamono e no Shuuchi Kouhou Jigyou
synopsis:
The video centers on Takumi Shimamoto, a 22-year-old freeter who quit college in his second year under the pretense of finding something that interests him to pursue. He's been working part-time jobs for about two years. He runs into a classmate from high school named Ayaka Yoshimura. She is about to graduate from college and is thinking about her job prospects. Ayaka is considering doing part-time work for the time being because there is not a job in particular that she wants to do.

(Source: ANN)

title: Booky Le Leyuan Xilie: Hao Xiguan Gushi
Booky Le Leyuan Xilie: Shuxue Tiandi
Bousai Keihatsu Douga
synopsis:
In preparation for a large-scale disaster occurring in the Tokyo metropolitan area, we used the visually appealing and memorable medium of anime to make a "disaster prevention educational video" with the objective of conveying easy-to-understand disaster-prevention knowledge to foreign residents of Japan. 

In the four languages of Japanese, English, Chinese, and Korean, the video teaches knowledge such as what be cautious of in the event of an earthquake, what to prepare in advance for an earthquake, and what to do if an earthquake occurs while at work or away from home. We hope that the video will be useful in raising disaster-prevention awareness, and in preparing for a disaster.

(Source: Tokyo International Communication Committee)

title: Bridge: My Little Friends
synopsis:
"I'll let you meet Shiro. I promise!" Jin the cat promised Mugi, who was grieving over the loss of his beloved dog Shiro. Jin loves Mugi very much, and after hearing the story of the Rainbow Bridge from his owner Kageyama, he decided to let Mugi meet Shiro at the end of the rainbow! Will Jin be able to save Mugi from her sadness? He invites the pigeons and squirrels from the neighborhood, and now Jin's big plan begins!

(Source: Official site, translated)

title: BT21 Universe Animation

Hailing from Planet BT, Prince Tata dreams to spread love across the galaxy. Deciding that destiny is at hand, Tata summons guardian robot Van to prepare for an interstellar journey to Earth.

Shortly after arrival, the Prince concludes that the most effective means to win over the hearts of earthlings is to become a super, no... something much more ambitious. A Universtar.

Realizing that a collective effort is crucial, Tata & Van scout for like-minded hopefuls to share in the dream. Soon they discover 6- Koya, RJ, Shooky, Mang, Chimmy and Cooky- to become what will be known as the most influential pop-culture sensation the galaxy has ever witnessed.

Kamimine Town, located in the eastern part of Saga Prefecture, is a place associated with the legendary military commander Minamoto no Tametomo, who is said to be "Yoshitsune in the east, Tametomo in the west."

Here, he called himself "Hachirou Chinzei" and built a castle. Chinzei and his army is said to have defeated 50,000 enemies, and many legends were left behind.

A master of bows and a big man, Chinzei had a rough temper and was even called a violent person by nature. But he was also a person with warmth and kindness full of humanity.
